title: Why is my payment not going through? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Your best user experience matters to us!
We strongly recommend you to cross-check the details entered on the payment page, i.e. “Expiration date, CVV and OTP” are accurate.
If you’re trying to transact using an International card, the transaction may fail.
Hence, we suggest you to try transacting using an "Indian bank-issued Debit card/ Credit card" and you should be good to go.
Still, no luck? We suggest you attempt using an alternate payment option.
